tag_list: social-media, keychain-social, marketing, twitter, facebook, craig-freeman
overview:
Dynamic, results-driven leader with an outstanding record of revenue generation and effective online marketing management. Over the past five years, created and sold over $10 million media and marketing programs to consumer orientated businesses and retail Fortune 500 companies. Deep, high level relationships within the marketing and advertising communities. Leveraged marketing experience into successful senior new business and management positions.

Clearsky Social is a strategic social media agency offering innovative campaigns with effective management to increase customer growth and loyalty for all types of businesses. Our goal at Clearsky Social is to “unlock” your business to a relationship with your potential customers through our creative principles which organically drive growth and promote your brand. Founded in 2010 by a team of marketing professionals that have proven success in using social media to expand the presence of corporations, businesses, and professionals. We aim to create an active customer relationship through social media for any level of business or brand while providing purpose driven results combined with effective strategies. Having a strong presence online is crucial for any business that wants to build a relationship with their target customer base in today’s generation.
